Author: Wandrew
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: Crystal Clear news.  A launched personal account in alpha version crypto exchange. Tested ordering structure and prioritization. At this point, work remained on usability and connecting the balance to crypto-exchange.  In our crypto exchange open an implemented possibility to three types of cryptocurrency accounts. The first type of accounts is for storing crypto user assets. The second and third type of accounts is ‚Äúfloating accounts‚Äù, which enable the rapid exchange of digital currencies.  Now we had difficulties with entering and exchanging fiat money.  Banks rejected earlier agreements on interaction with the introduction of electronic payments and currency exchange. Mostly pointing to examples of the top 10 crypto exchanges that have actually become brokerage companies. Now we consider connecting intermediaries.  Application development team reports that the application will be completed by the end of January. Body: Crystal Clear Services News. We apologize for the delay. The web application is in beta testing. On Wednesday, the planned release of the Web application. On Friday, 08 02 2019, a new marketing campaign is to launch aimed at registering specialists.  Negotiations are underway to join affiliate services into our Crypto Exchange. At the moment, the rules for working with cryptocurrency are tightening around the world, but we are sure that we will solve this problem. There are solutions, we are working in this direction.

Author: Wandrew
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: Implemented specialist's cabinet, with a new employment system. The registration system has been changed, updating the structure of entrance to the application. To enter an application, you must select a country. That will make it possible not to duplicate accounts, at the moment in the system you can register up to three accounts for one phone number. It all depends on the country and the internal codes.  On the login page, the user and the specialist disappear, you can find a switch if go to the side menu.  Now we are creating a system for adding categories and adding chat functionality. Author: Wandrew
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: Report on the work with app. Added a method for obtaining user data regardless of profile / api (general integration system) / v1 / client / get-info.  Added method for collecting information, about the profile by the required template for the distribution of the requests / api / v1 / client / get-info or / api / v1 / client / get (search)  Added and described new fields in Client's profile, changed data types for profile data [home_call | gender] (Extended profile function and necessary for searching)  Added feature to reduce the client's avatar. Downloaded avatar is automatically compressed and converted into thumbnail 240x240, 165x165, 90x90. Added encode image for image compression and image extension. (functional necessary to accelerate the application and reduce the load on the server) Added a method for obtaining available thumbnail images to output images of different sizes. (for the portfolio).  General information on crypto-exchange. Deployed and configured a server, with the necessary components, domain and certificate. Autoloader and the pure framework, ready. Added: User registration and authorization; A data structure of the balance of various crypto-currencies with the possibility of expanding Connected restfull to interact with exmo and tradingview, as well as a test in the home page.  In the application, it remains to implement the search and integrate with the blockchain. In the crypto-exchange, the kernel is being formed. We adding servers, for distributing a requests, presumably, there will be 11 servers. In the search, will be installed auto-calculator. It will indicate a value what you a chosen, or an equivalent in other currencies or crypto-currencies. We plan to add new categories and subcategories. In an app,  we will make a skew towards tourists side and helps in everyday life.  What kind of specialists we need in app: Tailors, Guides, Couriers, Hairdressers, Gardeners, People helping with dogs walking, Delivery of products from stores, Repair, Animators, Private catering and any private business.  We discussing conditions of loyalty for companies that started working with us before the end of July.  Information on terms of cooperation with privileges and bonuses will be posted later. Body: Crystal Clear Services News. Developers began to recreate a heart of the application. Now we are processing error handling during authorization. If a user cannot be authorized, the user will automatically redirect to the request form, if it's a network error, is notified to a user. The above functionality was implemented earlier only at a developer level. Additionally, we adding an algorithm for resetting the query pool, which reduces a load on the server, including increased security when the key is reset. A similar scheme works in online banks. Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: Crystal Clea Services announces the launch of the contest "Wet T-shirt". https://www.facebook.com/CCSer/posts/358081494680120 USERS OF ANY AGE AND SEX MAY PARTICIPATE. Winner will become the face of the company and will receive a cash prize or a trip to the "Mediterranean Sea". Will take part in promotional photo sessions and will represent the company at exhibitions.  Including there will be additional prizes: spectator sympathies, for artistry and idea, humor, resourcefulness and originality. We welcome to photos with tematic costumes...  Conditions for participation in contest: To take part in the contest, you must take a photo in a wet T-shirt with the text on a sheet, a poster or a T-shirt "I love Crystal Clear Services" and place a photo with the hashtag #iloveccs in the Instagram, after passing the first pre-election stage, you need to send a photo in any official channel Crystal Clear Services in the social networks.  The contest will be held in 3 stages. The first stage is held from April 26 to June 26. Participants are defined. From June 27 to July 10, the second stage Defines the finalists. Stage 3, prizes. Winners. The competition is scheduled to end from July 10 to 17. The administration of the competition reserves the right to use the photos of the participants in the advertising companies. Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: Every business start-ups has its own struggles when finding the right supplier, advertiser, employees, and managers.  At the modern era, there are always middlemen to handle the job of finding these people, the down side to that is you do not just trust a middleman to do the job, that is why sometimes your middleman has to be your friend, acquaintance, or someone who you believe can be trusted with in the job.  A good thing Crystal Clear project provides its own ecosystem sort of, so that any businesses who would apply to them, would lessen the hassle of finding the right staff, and also customer to the business.  All for that and more for just 1% fee, the smallest fee in the market.  Thank you for sharing your coin dev, I hope you will succeed someday, I will be there to support you.

Author: ArtVande1ay
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: My previous market analysis actually failed so I could be wrong, but I have seen MANY coins without any business background or with some business ideas behind them but completely unnecessary and irrelevant to the World; with over 10 million $ of market capitalization. That is why I actually choose CCT and another one to buy out of many, because I think what they are doing is really great.  So even if we talk about 'only' 10 million $ as market cap. at current circulating CCT supply that would mean 2.21$ / coin, that is why actually many people bought at 2$ as you say, it was not considered expensive at all. Then, if the business turns on fully, this number can be tenfold and I know this is very bold thing to say at current price but think about the purpose of the coins and what they are going to be used for Worldwide, therefor I am quite sure that the business target of the coin price is a 2 digit number in dollars and the price will be naturally pushed up by the users who use the service. Global marketing starts in May, but people are always impatient, especially in the cryptomarkets. Probably that is why there is a very usual trend there: Coin released, price rallies, then slowly goes down, volume decreases and then soon it rallies again with high volume. I can give you many examples.  I am loyal to the idea, I still think it is one of the best out there, so I am gonna stash my coins and wait for a couple of months

Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: From what I know it is a way to a make a coin more popular. Nothing is risk-free, especially in the high volatility cryptoworld, but the risk is not mainly in the investbox itself (in my opinion) but in the coin you buy. The coin might lose more value than the investbox could provide by the percentages. So I would never buy a coin just because it can be put in the  investbox, but it is a very nice extra when you already think that the coin itself is also a good choice to invest in. I bought CCT way before the investbox option appeared. Please, correct me if I am wrong.

Author: Wandrew
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: You saw a value of the CCT token on the stock exchange is dropping! Becomes lower than a sale price. This causes indignation ...  There is a feeling that a project not return to its previous level?  For many investors, such a sad picture of the events was not new. Someone started to write "SCAM" and began to sell a purchased tokens.  However, do not forget that a project is only 3 months old and the CCT token is primarily intended for payment of services in the application and the low price of the token is excellent! Imagine this will allow the customer to save a lot of money on a platform services and performers' services.  How will the application work?  Simply, the unemployment rate is high enough, many people work in a sphere of private services. How as it will be. First there will be a minimum of performers ready to invest their free time to the Crystal Clear Services platform, in exchange for tokens.  On the Cryctal Clear Services platform you can always pay for services with tokens CCT. Thus, with a seemingly negative situation in the form of a token rate drop, the investor has the benefit and receives the services he needs with high discount. In fact, now the investor receives a discount in the cost of the service.  Now in sales do not exceed 1% of CCT tokens, that with a natural increase in demand will create a price increase.  The price of the token begins to rise and a price becomes higher than the sale price on the ICO The rules for using a Cryctal Clear Services platform involve choosing a payment method, or CCT tokens, or in fiat (USD...), as a result of which there will always be an opportunity to sell some of its CCT tokens on the exchange and you will have received amount to pay a services CCS  in Fiat, that logically it will be more profitable.  The operation of transferring CCT tokens in Fiat, will happen instantly in the application. In the future, the CCT token is not subject to inflation, but only by fluctuations in demand. And there will be a price regulation tool.  Crystal Clear Services for market relations and if we now begin to artificially hold the rate not less than ICO, then after some time we will be stop growing... Otherwise, it would not be profitable for customers to pay for made work!

Body: Good afternoon. Our program bounty paid 99.9%, due to the collapse of the tokens have been temporarily stopped. Yesterday we paid a disputed job. We want to grow. At this point, we temporarily freeze payments on Bounty.

Author: Wandrew
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: Dear participants Crystal Clear Service. We want to sum up subtotals. https://www.facebook.com/CCSer/posts/294850507669886  1) We have prepared a new landing page for the interaction with partner sites, today their more than 20  2) We launched beta version of the applications Crystal Clear Service on Android and  iOS. At the moment, application for IOS is moderated. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.crystal.android  3) We prepared launching advertising channels, around 50, with targeted traffic, more than 28.57 million visitors per month.  4) In the testing phase, we include traffic up to 400 000 visitors per month, with a conversion ratio not less than 0.01%. At this stage, we plan to work with UI / UX. Now we can say, that we are working with a little ahead schedule.  In addition, we identified the target audience for Crystal Clear Service applications.  As a result, has been prepared attracting and developing plan. In particular, we structured prices and statistics. It is determined, men use services on average at least twice a month, women are at least five times a month. Based on the data obtained and the picture of the users of blockchain, we can say that our target audience uses at least three times a month, services provided by CCS.  Conditionally, we divided the services into 3 parts: 1) courier services and petty help 5 $. 2) Personal services (manicure, haircut, dry cleaning, computer repair) advice and assistance. From 10 to 60 $. 3) Category, contractual cost of services.  At the time, when CCT token is being used in application, we expect, small job will cost 0.01 CCT, which is equivalent to $ 5.  More serious work, the example of consultation will cost 0.02-0.12 CCP, which will be equivalent to $ 10-60. This is the approximate cost of dry cleaning, haircuts, manicure. As you can see, we have very serious plans.  Our team was very pleased feedback of our Chinese investors actively trading on the stock exchange.  But we want to remind, ICO exists for the development of Blockchain, and we are working to develop this concept, we did not freeze the project. We work on time and with a little advance.  With respect Crystal Clear Service team.

Author: Wandrew
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: We hasten to share with you, the long-awaited news ahead of schedule and according to numerous requests.  We present application Crystal Clear Services. (Beta version) https://itunes.apple.com/ru/app/crystal/id1304381579 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.crystal.android  Today we are launching an advertising campaign to attract users of application, in the region of Russia. In addition, we began to advertise the CCT token for an audience not familiar with the crypto currency, but actively using discounts and coupons.  According to industry research, conducted by the Valassis marketing company in early 2017, up to 90% of Americans use coupon services.  The volume of the world market of coupons, is huge.  We are planning to start cooperation with exchanges of coupons in the near future. Now we begin testing applications and landing pages.  https://translate.yandex.ru/translate?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwng.su%2Fpromotest1&lang=ru-en (Sample test page with auto-translation)  We will analyze the channels of advertising and will work on the design. A / B Testing and UI / UX design. https://www.facebook.com/CCSer/posts/296708287484108?notif_id=1511178602127455&notif_t=scheduled_post_published

Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•

"Crystal Clear Services brings a revolutionary future and the latest technologies from the online industry to offline local services, which everyone uses on a regular basis and inevitably faces serious problems of lack of organization and non-transparency of the existing system of services."  I think that offering services such as these on the blockchain is the way of the future for our society.  I am not sure if CCT will be the most successful platform to do so, but IMO it is worth a chance.  Already being traded on EtherDelta is reassuring to me. Thanks for the information.

Author: EpStROM
Title: [ICO FINISHED]üî•Crystal - Revolutionary project for everyoneüî•
Body: Crystal Clear platform will be a very benefit for companies and performers that provide local services Crystal is the global platform where performers can find their direct customers and vice versa. In the real world service companies are spending lots of money for advertising and they have to include these expenditures to the customer's check, but within the Crystal platform the fee will be only 1% for all services making them much more profitable and competitive! Also there are other benefits: - global blacklisting - customer's trust - convenience of use - multi currency wallets - worldwide customers   Please ask more questions and we'll unswer it
